name: A Human In Monsteropolis
description:
A Human In Monsteropolis is a project started in the Fall of 2020 as part of a video tutorial series on YouTube. Its goal is to give people a realistic look at learning how to use RPG Maker software to create their own games.

It is a work-in-progress, and new versions will be added over time as more tutorial videos are completed.

The current playable version is from October 8th 2020, and is the current state of the game thru tutorial video part 25.

If you'd like to watch how it was built and learn how to use RPG Maker yourself, you can view the tutorial video series here:

If you have the RPG Maker MV software for making your own games installed on your computer, you can download the Project Files ZIPs from this page, and reference everything in the editor that was shown in the tutorial videos for your own benefit and/or entertainment.
